WorkItem.Description:
As posted in another section, I cannot delete stories and i am getting an 'unexpected error' message. I am now updating this to report that the same message appears if I try to 'approve a story as spam' (text as used by Kigg): An unexpected error has occurred while confirming story as spam.
This gets a bit messy: I cannot delete stories, however i cannot mark them as spam either because of the above so if I want to publish stories , I am also forced to publish 'unwanted' stories. A solution to this would be most appreciated

thanks

Marco
WorkItem.Summary: Unexpected error when marking story as spam

Comments.Message: Fixed in changeset 29462 but release isn't updated yet
Thank you , but how can I get it sorted, in the meantime? Also, is this changeset fixing both the delete and mark as spam issue?

yes, the changeset fix both.
You have 2 options. Download the changeset, Recompile the Core Project and replace the dll only or change the configuration to use linq to SQL
